ModMetaData.name: Harvesting Is Plant Cutting (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Lytalm
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of Lytalms mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1361691923
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/HarvestingIsPlantCutting][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/WjDSfUn.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/h5VwTNL.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img]
Removes the Harvesting task from Growing and put it in Plant cutting work type instead.
Growing work type has been renamed Sowing.
Note : You can safely remove or add this mod to any save, as it is only patches things from the core mod through Defs.
** Thanks **
Special thanks to kaptain_kavern for his mod "Corrected WorkGivers" which I took the orginal code from and modified it to my taste.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
